pages.title: Orbital Scan #0079
pages.text: $(bold)Subject: Acheronite Personal Protection$()$(br2)The material that's killing you can also protect you. The ORSA tradition of irony continues.$(br2)Acheronite armor provides $(bold)netherite-level protection$() and $(bold)complete frostbite immunity$(). The material that gives you frostbite when raw $(italic)prevents$() it when refined.$(br2)$(italic)"So the cure for the cold... is more cold?"$(br)"Refined cold. There's a difference."$(br)"Is there?"$()

pages.title: Properties
pages.text: $(bold)Full set bonus:$()$(br)$(li)Frostbite immunity — carry shards freely$(li)Netherite-tier defense and toughness$(br2)$(bold)WARNING:$() Acheronite armor does $(bold)NOT$() provide atmospheric protection. Only the $(l:orsa_equipment/eva_suit)EVA Suit$(/l) does that. This armor is for combat and frostbite — not breathing.$(br2)$(italic)Looking cool does not prevent suffocation. Wear your EVA suit.$()

pages.title: Acheronite Chestplate
pages.text: Standard crafting pattern. The ingots are cold. The chestplate is warm. Science is weird.

pages.title: Acheronite Helmet
pages.text: Protects your head and your dignity. At least one of those matters.

pages.title: Acheronite Leggings
pages.text: Your legs called. They want to stop being frozen. This helps.

pages.title: Acheronite Boots
pages.text: Walk on frozen everything without losing toes. Revolutionary.
